# This file contains metadata for your plugin. Since 
# version 2.0 of QGIS this is the proper way to supply 
# information about a plugin. The old method of 
# embedding metadata in __init__.py will 
# is no longer supported since version 2.0.

# This file should be included when you package your plugin.# Mandatory items:

[general]
name=Encoded Polyline Exporter
qgisMinimumVersion=3.0
description=Export a vector layer to a .csv file in Encoded Polyline format, with optional geometry simplification
version=1.2
author=Patrick Vinton
email=patrickvinton@hotmail.com

about=Export a vector layer to a .csv file in Encoded Polyline format, with optional geometry simplification

tracker=https://github.com/pvinton/QGIS-EncodedPolylineExporter-plugin/issues
repository=https://github.com/pvinton/QGIS-EncodedPolylineExporter-plugin/
# End of mandatory metadata

# Recommended items:

# Uncomment the following line and add your changelog:
# changelog=

# Tags are comma separated with spaces allowed
tags=encoded polyline, polyline export, polyline, encode, export, csv

homepage=https://github.com/pvinton/QGIS-EncodedPolylineExporter-plugin/
category=Plugins
icon=icon.png
# experimental flag
experimental=False

# deprecated flag (applies to the whole plugin, not just a single version)
deprecated=False
